summary: A power-hungry sorcerer curses a princess to live as a swan by day in this tale of everlasting love.
cast: Jack Palance|Howard McGillin|Michelle Nicastro|Liz Callaway|John Cleese|Steven Wright|Steve Vinovich|Mark Harelik|James Arrington|Davis Gaines|Joel McKinnon Miller|Dakin Matthews|Sandy Duncan|Brian Nissen|Adam Wylie|Adrian Zahiri|Tom Alan Robbins|Bess Hopper|Jon Joyce|Susan Boyd|Catte Adams|Angie Jaree|Bobbi Page|Amick Byram|Beth Anderson|Kerry Katz|Stephen W. Amerson|Gary Stockdale|Susie Stevens-Logan|Rick Logan|Randy Crenshaw|Carmen Twillie|Susan McBride|Tampa M. Lann|Sally Stevens|Debbie Hall|Bob Joyce|Oren Waters|Michael Dees|Jim Haas|Lex de Azevedo|Jonathan Hadary|David Zippel|Patrick Pinney
title: La princesa cisne
